__inputs.description: Prometheus datasource containing OBI reliability metrics

description: Golden signal metrics (RED) collected via OpenTelemetry eBPF Instrumentation (OBI) in kvisor DaemonSet. Covers HTTP, gRPC, SQL, Redis, and Kafka.
title: CAST AI — Reliability Metrics (OBI)
